main event: A UFO sighting was reported in Dobbston, Ohio on May 10, 1966, involving two witnesses observing an amber or light tan disc-shaped object.
interesting points: The observed objects emitted a low pulsating humming sound,The objects appeared to hover at about 4000-5000 feet with no visible means of propulsion,Only one of the witnesses was able to see the objects clearly,After several minutes of observation, the objects seemed to simply disappear from sight,The report mentions a hand-drawn sketch of the object described by a taxi driver.
sighted object: one or two amber or light tan disc-shaped objects
witness description: A brother-in-law who saw the objects and a son who confirmed the description.
